analysis.description:
Etheraffle.disburseFunds (/unique_contracts/0x4251139bf01d46884c95b27666c9e317df68b876.sol#2084-2101) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ReceiverInterface(disburseAddr).receiveEther.value(half)() (/unique_contracts/0x4251139bf01d46884c95b27666c9e317df68b876.sol#2094)
	- ReceiverInterface(ethRelief).receiveEther.value(profit - half)() (/unique_contracts/0x4251139bf01d46884c95b27666c9e317df68b876.sol#2094-2095)

Reentrancy in Etheraffle.__callback (/unique_contracts/0x4251139bf01d46884c95b27666c9e317df68b876.sol#2128-2152):
